sqlMap.statement:
SELECT A.ADPTRCD, A.WORKGRPCD, A.ADPTRBZWKNAME, A.ADPTRDESC, A.SNDRCVKIND, A.ADPTRKIND, A.JNDIDATASOURCE, A.LSTNERCLSNAME, A.PRPTYGROUPID, A.DELYN, A.ENC1 FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 A
A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD = #WORKGRPCD#
A.WORKGRPCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD = #ADPTRCD#
A.ADPTRCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#

SELECT A.WORKGRPCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 A
A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD = #WORKGRPCD#
A.WORKGRPCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD = #ADPTRCD#
A.ADPTRCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
GROUP BY A.WORKGRPCD

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT A.WORKGRPCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 A
A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD = #WORKGRPCD#
A.WORKGRPCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD = #ADPTRCD#
A.ADPTRCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
GROUP BY A.WORKGRPCD ) WORKGRP

SELECT A.ADPTRCD, A.ADPTRCDSEQ, A.SQLNAME, A.INTFID, A.SQLNAMEDESC, A.DBSQL, A.DBEVENTWHERE, A.TXCOMMITUNITCNT, A.SELECTUNITCNT, A.DELYN, A.LAYOUTKEY, A.DIVFIELDORDER, A.CODECKEY FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA03 A LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 B ON B.ADPTRCD = A.ADPTRCD
1 = 1
B.WORKGRPCD = #WORKGRPCD#
B.WORKGRPCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') B.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
B.WORKGRPCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') B.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD = #ADPTRCD#
A.ADPTRCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') B.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') B.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#

SELECT A.INTFID, A.INTFNAME, A.INTFDESC, A.WORKGRPCD, A.SNDADPTRCD, A.SNDADPTRCDSEQ, A.BATCHTYPE, A.REGDATE, A.REGUSERID, A.MODDATE, A.MODUSERID, A.INTFSTARTDATE, A.INTFENDDATE, A.DELYN, A.EVENTCALLVAL, A.RESTARTYN, A.LEVEL4, A.POSTJOBHOSTNAME, A.POSTJOBPORTNONAME, A.POSTJOBUID, A.POSTJOBUSERPWDNAME, A.POSTJOBCMD, A.SIZEONCE, A.PROCTERM, A.RESCHGR, A.RESCHGRTLNO, A.REQCHGR, A.REQCHGRTLNO FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 A
A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD = #WORKGRPCD#
A.WORKGRPCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.INTFID = #INTFID#
A.INTFID LIKE CONCAT('%', #INTFID#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.INTFID NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #INTFID#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#

SELECT A.WORKGRPCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 A
A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD = #WORKGRPCD#
A.WORKGRPCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.INTFID = #INTFID#
A.INTFID LIKE CONCAT('%', #INTFID#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.INTFID NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #INTFID#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
GROUP BY A.WORKGRPCD

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT A.WORKGRPCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 A
1 = 1
A.WORKGRPCD = #WORKGRPCD#
A.WORKGRPCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.WORKGRPCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.INTFID = #INTFID#
A.INTFID LIKE CONCAT('%', #INTFID#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.INTFID NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #INTFID#, '%') A.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
GROUP BY A.WORKGRPCD ) WORKGRP

SELECT A.ADPTRCD, A.ADPTRCDSEQ, A.INTFID, A.FTPNAME, A.FTPNAMEDESC, A.FTPHOSTNAME, A.RMTSEVRFTPPORTNONAME, A.RMTSEVRFTPUID, A.RMTSEVRFTPUSERPWDNAME, A.FTPARCHIVEDIR, A.FTPSTOREFILEPATTERN, A.NEXTOPTION, A.CHECKNAME, A.FTPCHECKDIR, A.SYSTEMNAME, A.SYSTEMOWNER, A.SYSTEMOWNERTELEPHONE, A.SYSTEMOTHERTXT, A.SECTIONVAL, A.FTPBACKUPDIR, A.SFTPYN, A.LAYOUTKEY FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 A LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 B ON B.ADPTRCD = A.ADPTRCD
1 = 1
B.WORKGRPCD = #WORKGRPCD#
B.WORKGRPCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') B.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
B.WORKGRPCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') B.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD = #ADPTRCD#
A.ADPTRCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') B.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#
A.ADPTRCD NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #ADPTRCD#, '%') B.WORKGRPCD = #_WORKGRP#

SELECT A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, A.INTFID, A.BATCHTYPE, A.SCHEKIND, A.SNDRCVSTARTHMS, A.SNDRCVENDHMS, A.MSGSNDRID, A.SCHEFRSTREGIHMS, A.RQSTRECVFILESTORGDIRNAME, A.THISMSGUSEYN, A.THISMSGSCHEDESC, A.THISMSGREGSNTID, A.THISMSGREGIHMS, A.THISMSGAMNDRID, A.THISMSGAMNDHMS, A.CYCLEKIND, A.CYCLECODE, A. MONWEEKCODE1, A.MONWEEKCODE2, A.DAYCYCLETIME, A.ACTTIME1, A.ACTTIME2, A.ACTTIME3, A.ACTTIME4, A.ACTTIME5, A.ACTTIME6, A.ACTDAY, A.ACTDAY2, A.ACTDAY3, A.ACTDAY4 FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 A
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #WORKGRPCD#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID = #BJOBMSGSCHEID#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID LIKE CONCAT('%', #BJOBMSGSCHEID#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #BJOBMSGSCHEID#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#

SELECT U.WORKGRPCD FROM ( SELECT SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) AS WORKGRPCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 A
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #WORKGRPCD#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID = #BJOBMSGSCHEID#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID LIKE CONCAT('%', #BJOBMSGSCHEID#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #BJOBMSGSCHEID#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
} U GROUP BY U.WORKGRPCD

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) AS WORKGRPCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 A
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #WORKGRPCD#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID = #BJOBMSGSCHEID#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID LIKE CONCAT('%', #BJOBMSGSCHEID#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #BJOBMSGSCHEID#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
) U GROUP BY U.WORKGRPCD ) WORKGRP

SELECT A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, A.INTFID, A.REGID, A.REGDATE, A.MODID, A.MODDATE, A.DELYN FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES09 A
1 = 1
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #WORKGRPCD#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #WORKGRPCD#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID = #BJOBMSGSCHEID#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID LIKE CONCAT('%', #BJOBMSGSCHEID#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
A.BJOBMSGSCHEID NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #BJOBMSGSCHEID#, '%') SPLIT_PART(A.BJOBMSGSCHEID, '_', 2) = #_WORKGRP#
